General DNS attributes

Match of the following:

Object class of entry
Full domain name (associatedDomain) contains
First DNS label (dc) is
Description text (description) contains
DNS entry has RR data
DNS resource records
A RR / IPv4 address (aRecord) is
AAAA RR / IPv6 address (aAAARecord) is
PTR RR (pTRRecord) contains
SRV RR (sRVRecord) contains
NS RR (nSRecord) is
SOA RR (sOARecord) is
